q: new structure, Page will lead product development and technology strategy, while Brin "will devote his energies to strategic projects, in particular working on new products". Eric Schmidt will take the role of executive chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. He will also act as internal advisor to the two others. He hinted that one of his key roles would be communicating with, and lobbying, government agencies, as calls for antitrust probes rise
